column5: Another fine week of Walleye & Salmon fishing and   ...both lakes seem to be on fire this summer .. the big kings are starting to get there staging colors and are getting bigger 4 days left to try to get a Sun Derby Winner .. Walleye fishing off Port Maitland should be still hot for my Tourney on Sept 1st  ;D we had big catches all week long with double digits of fish being landed  ...lets hope it keeps up for another few weeks before i end my Great Lake Charter's for the season ..then it will be Niagara River time  8-)
wow,great pics,you sure are having a great year,congrats
Great shots, looks like everyone had a great time.
That Brown is a monster! Great pics, thanks for posting! HH
Hey Steve. I think you are going to clean out the great lakes soon.lol
Nice pics.... happen the have the blondes phone number? LOL.... man is that a nice Brown!  Gerritt.
Ya nice brown!!!!!!!!!I hope Percher puts me on fish like that when I go to lake O.  MTP

WOW...RIGHT ON STEVE !!!!!!   well they are some great catches of fish there bud,some real,nice bows,some salmon and man gotta love that brown trout...you sure are doing amazing  job for all your customers,you can tell by the look on their faces...keep up the great work steve....thanks for sharing all those pics    cheers
Amazing fish Steve, well done and nice post...  The brown is one I would hang on my wall...  Cheers  Jen
great pics.  That is one huge brown!  Cheers!
Again....That is a monster brown!!! Great pics.
